Text.Page:
You're , right? Maybe you can help me. The ordinary soldiers are useless.

They sent me here to study the undead and find a weakness, but the troops can't gather...um...specimens.

Kill {@LinkCreature:33#16#anguished minions} and {@LinkCreature:33#17#ebon inquisitors}.

And take it from me: you're doing their trapped souls a favor by returning them to the Dream.
Trust me: if you die down here, you'd rather your soul return to the titans' Dream than to be trapped in an undead body for years. If not centuries...
